event_name: The International: Streams, Secret Shop, and More

announcement_body.headline: The International: Streams, Secret Shop, and More
body: [img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3703047/b96eac3cc54c98b1c43b9ed1313cb7e36f4b6f71.jpg[/img]
The best Dota players in the world have arrived in Copenhagen and the games are about to begin. That's right: The Road to TI's Group Stage is officially underway for The International 2024.
There's a lot of fun stuff to cover before the event starts, and not a lot of time, so we're gonna stop introducing the information and start the informing. Let's get to it.
[h3]Tournament Streams[/h3]
Group Stage is always glorious chaos. This year, almost fifty games will be played in the first two days alone, spread across three streams for each of the four official broadcast languages:
[list]

[*][b]English[/b]: Twitch: [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti]Stream A[/url], [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_2]Stream B[/url], [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_3]Stream C[/url]; SteamTV: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198198486900]Stream A[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198239691668]Stream B[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198207546029]Stream C[/url]; YouTube: [url=https://www.youtube.com/@dota2]All Streams[/url]

[*][b]Spanish[/b]: Twitch: [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_es]Stream A[/url], [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_es_2]Stream B[/url], [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_es_3]Stream C[/url]; Facebook: [url=https://www.facebook.com/dota2]All Streams[/url]; SteamTV: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199212802637]Stream A[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199212713691]Stream B[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199212705375]Stream C[/url]; YouTube: [url=https://www.youtube.com/@dota2]All Streams[/url]

[*][b]Russian[/b]: Twitch: [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_ru2]Stream A[/url], [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_ru3]Stream B[/url], [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_ru4]Stream C[/url], [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_ru]Multi-Stream[/url]; SteamTV: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198239716708]Stream A[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198207580869]Stream B[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198321277386]Stream C[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198207552741]Multi-Stream[/url]; YouTube: [url=https://www.youtube.com/@dota2]All Streams[/url]

[*][b]Chinese[/b]: Twitch: [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_cn]Stream A[/url], [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_cn_2]Stream C[/url], [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_cn_3]Stream C[/url]; SteamTV: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198208088121]Stream A[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198208089225]Stream B[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198208096163]Stream C[/url]; Bilibili: [url=https://live.bilibili.com/46936]Stream A[/url], [url=https://live.bilibili.com/46937]Stream B[/url], [url=https://live.bilibili.com/312785]Stream C[/url]
[/list]
After Group Stage wraps up, starting Friday, September 6th, both The Road to the International and The International itself will broadcast on one stream per official language:
[list]
[*][b]English[/b]: [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti]Twitch[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198198486900]SteamTV[/url], [url=https://www.youtube.com/@dota2]YouTube[/url]

[*][b]Spanish[/b]: [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_es]Twitch[/url], [url=https://www.facebook.com/dota2/videos]FaceBook[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199212802637]SteamTV[/url], [url=https://www.youtube.com/@dota2]YouTube[/url]

[*][b]Russian[/b]: [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_ru]Twitch[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198239716708]SteamTV[/url],  [url=https://www.youtube.com/@dota2]YouTube[/url]

[*][b]Chinese[/b]: [url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_cn]Twitch[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198208088121]SteamTV[/url], [url=https://live.bilibili.com/46936]Bilibili[/url]
[/list]

If you're looking for [i]unofficial[/i] languages, we've got those, too. We've handed out more than a dozen broadcast licenses, ranging from Bulgarian to Vietnamese, so check in with your local Dota community to find the best way to watch online.
And as always, anyone is welcome to join in on the streaming fun. We only ask that you follow our [url=https://www.dota2.com/dotatv]community streaming guidelines[/url].
[h3]The Secret Shop[/h3]

The International Secret Shop is once again open for business. We've got everything from mouse pads to jerseys to a real-life Toy Pudge plush, and so much more. There are two separate storefronts, [url=https://na.dota2secretshop.com/]one for US deliveries[/url] and [url=https://int.dota2secretshop.com/]one for international deliveries[/url].
[h3]Tickets and Badges[/h3]
Ground-floor tickets for The International have sold out, and even arena seats are mostly gone, but there are still [url=https://www.ticketmaster.dk/artist/941884]a few left[/url].
For attendees:[list]
[*]Your Ticketmaster ticket can be used for re-entry. Just remember to scan out as you leave so you can re-enter later in the day if youâ€™d like.

[*]Each day of the event, you'll get a new commemorative badge with a unique code that can be registered to your Steam account for potential Crimson Witness treasure drops. (The URL for registration is on the badge.)[/list]
[h3]What Else?[/h3]

That's it for now. Honestly, that was a lot of information, and we're not going to lie, there might even be more on the way. But for now, don't worry about it. Just sit back, relax, and reread this blog post until you can recite it phonetically. We'll be calling everyone personally to verify you've got it memorized. You got this! Talk soon.
